resources.string: Developer: Abhishek Banerjee \nBackend: Kracekumar Ramaraju \nDesign: Tanay Kumar Bera

PyCon India 2015 is the official app to view conference schedule list and submit feedback. We would love to hear from you so please give us your valuable feedback on the workshops and talks. It would help us build more productive and engaging conferences.

Click the heart shaped button to receive prior notification alerts before event. \nFill up all the requied fields before submitting the feedback. Required Fields are marked with an asterix (*). \nClick on the title or description to open the details view.
